name: Dan's Narcissistic Adventure In Jam Land
name_original: Dan's Narcissistic Adventure In Jam Land
description:
Made for GMC Jam 21 - the last ever jam on the original GMC. The two themes were "Day and Night" or "Sacrifice". The handicap was that the game should be humorous, and the hype word was "gifts".

Play as me, GameDevDan, as you explore Jam Land. The world is filled with GMC users who made the GMC Jam the success it is today, and it even features an in-game museum of all 20 GMC Jams to date.

If you perform a gift-trading sequence in the right order, you'll be able to unlock the door to Club Dadio and defeat the crazy final boss.
